---
title: Addresses by Asset
category: Address

---

Read addresses by asset ID.

###### GET /assets/:id/addresses

```
// cURL Example
curl -i -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJSUzUxMiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..hmMaj8JQrZAjBqQRyHh1qSUE7KLm8qwl2HMGsN59FNSdpfzXeX0pZt6aWg79R-jhmyLbfrGABEtu7ptUb3HN3fwbSe1k5_FnxP9pgpxJv3uJu6NJG5iS4d0X6IM58dfwNTmQjR2w9y88inmGhc7gsQ_mR1tC68ND433bPY6wg2U" "https://api.mixin.one/assets/43d61dcd-e413-450d-80b8-101d5e903357/addresses"
```
